original_text: Also day by day, from the first day unto the last day, he read in the book of the law of God. And they kept the feast seven days; and on the eighth day was a solemn assembly, according unto the manner.
korean_text: 에스라는 첫날부터 끝날까지 날마다 하나님의 율법책을 낭독하고 무리가 이레 동안 절기를 지키고 여덟째 날에 규례를 따라 성회를 열었느니라

sentences.original_text: from the first day unto the last day
he read in the book of the law of God
And they kept the feast seven days
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 일곱 날 동안 절기를 지켰다

sentences.original_text: and on the eighth day was a solemn assembly
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 여덟째 날에 엄숙한 모임이 있었다
